tool.name: Generate pileup format
tool.command: vdb-config --restore-defaults; vdb-config -s "/repository/user/main/public/root=\$PWD"; sra-pileup --log-level fatal #if str( $region ) != "": --aligned-region $region #end if #if str( $minMapq ) != "": --minmapq $minMapq #end if #if $input.input_select == "file": $input.file #elif $input.input_select == "accession_number": $input.accession #elif $input.input_select == "text": `cat $input.text` #end if > $output
tool.help: This tool produces pileup format from sra archives using sra-pileup. Browse the NCBI SRA for SRR accessions at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Traces/sra/sra.cgi?view=studies. The sra-pileup program is developed at NCBI, and is available at: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Traces/sra/sra.cgi?view=software. Contact Matt Shirley at mdshw5@gmail.com for support and bug reports.
